name: data-reader
description: Parses data from Fields of Mistria wiki.
author: Andrew Young

scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist && rimraf src/minecraft/libraries && rimraf src/minecraft/logs && rimraf src/minecraft/versions && rimraf src/minecraft/world && rimraf src/minecraft/banned-ips.json && rimraf src/minecraft/banned-players.json && rimraf src/minecraft/eula.txt && rimraf src/minecraft/ops.json && rimraf src/minecraft/server.properties && rimraf src/minecraft/usercache.json && rimraf src/minecraft/whitelist.json
